comments: lim(n -> Infinity, a(n)/a(n-1)) = (sqrt(2) + sqrt(3))^8 = 4801 + 1960*sqrt(6). - _Ant King_, Nov 06 2011Pentgonal numbers (A000326) which are also centered octagonal numbers (A016754). - _Colin Barker_, Jan 11 2015

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (9603,-9603,1).
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,10^9,g=(n*(3*n-1)/2); if(issquare(g),print(g)))(PARI) concat(0, Vec(x*(1+198*x+x^2)/((1-x)*(1-9602*x+x^2)) + O(x^20))) \\ _Colin Barker_, Jun 24 2015
